author: Steven Ross
text: As a result of the recent tornados a concerned citizen has inquired about the availability of the Town providing a shelter/facility prior to a tornado/storm for people seeking a safe location.  Do any communities provide this type of shelter/facility prior to the tornado/storm?  Is so, what are the criteria for deciding to open a facility, what is the process for making a facility available, and how is the availability communicated?  Thank you for your assistance.
title: Tornado Shelter
